frontmatter.title: Simple Map
frontmatter.problem: You want do embed a map on a page, perhaps with a marker and a popup
frontmatter.solution: Build a component based using the gatsby-plugin-leaflet-react plugin
frontmatter.summary: Embed a map on a page, perhaps with a marker and a popup
